subject: Re: Product Brochure
preview: Hi Rena, Ok sure: Here is the print version: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ypjhajmowmhd5lw/A4-duracube-product-brochure-2019-PRINT-11-Mar-2019.pdf?dl=0Here is the digital version: https://www.dropbox.c

full_threads.body:
Hi Rena, 

Ok sure: 

Here is the print version: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ypjhajmowmhd5lw/A4-duracube-product-brochure-2019-PRINT-11-Mar-2019.pdf?dl=0
Here is the digital version: https://www.dropbox.com/s/sptji3l66ywhaf5/A4-duracube-product-brochure-2019-DIGITAL-11-Mar-2019.pdf?dl=0

Heath,

We need the '300 Series Satin Chrome Hardware' on all the toilet partitions pages please (pedestal Mount Overhead Braced, Floor Mount Overhead Braced, Floor Mount ceiling Fixed).
How you have it on the Full Height unisex page is perfect - If you could just copy it for the above pages please.



Thanks

Regards,

Rena <> Bulloch
Sales Consultant
1300 387 228 | rena.bulloch@duracube.com.au <mailto:rena.bulloch@duracube.com.au> | www.duracube.com.au <http://www.duracube.com.au/>



---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>

Subject: Re: Product Brochure
To: Rena Bulloch <rena.bulloch@duracube.comry.au <mailto:rena.bulloch@duracube.comry.au>>


Hi Rena,

Ok all done, here is the link for the PRINT file: https://www.dropbox.com/s/teg3dqf23q7ni9n/A4-duracube-product-brochure-2019-PRINT-4-Mar-2019.pdf?dl=0 <https://www.dropbox.com/s/teg3dqf23q7ni9n/A4-duracube-product-brochure-2019-PRINT-4-Mar-2019.pdf?dl=0>

And the DIGITAL file is attached.

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU <https://wolfiq.com.au/>
E. heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au> | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

<https://wolfiq.com.au/>
